mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USERNAME, PASSWORD, PHONE_NUMBER, EMAIL, NAME) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{name})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET NAME = #{name}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber}, EMAIL = #{email}, PROFILE_MESSAGE = #{profileMessage}, profile_id = #{profileId} WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT USERNAME FROM USER WHERE USERNAME = #{username})
